caption.title: Distribution range, sampling sites and genetic structure for Senegalia senegal populations analysed in the present study.
caption.p: (A) nuclear (B) study area and (C) chloroplast genomes. Each population is represented by a pie chart showing proportional membership of clusters or share of haplotypes. Haplotype network was generated by TCS in PopArt with circle sizes proportional to the relative frequency of a particular haplotype.
